channel.title: A ban evasion issue
channel.description:
[url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=535004]http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=535004[/url] [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=535013]http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=535013[/url] [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=535016]http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=535016[/url] Their changing their ingame name very fast I thought that wasn't possible.
You can see a list of ingame names they used at [url=http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,491916.msg3624527.html#msg3624527]http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,491916.msg3624527.html#msg3624527[/url] I tried ipbanning etc.

item.title: A ban evasion issue
